question: As well as making money,businesses have social responsibilities,Do you agree or dis agree?
text: In the modern era, business play a vital role in our society , which has a huge part in country's economy so some responsibility up  individuals to them. In my opinion , please statement is extremely right and they should be doing it.

First of all, they should sell healthier products , which do not harmful to the body. If people have it , it will impact on them so that they are facing some bad diseases, For example , the strong chemical was used by the many countries last year that is the reason , which decreases the health right in many countries. as a result, it also obstructs economy.

Moreover , they must not advertise, which has include narcotic substances because of  people will be addicted to them. consequently, they become all as your as in the past. furthermore , they should do some social work , what is encourage people to do something , which help to our society or Nations. consequently , patriotism awakens in people's hearts.

In my point of view , the industry must do some voluntary work , which is helpful to their particular nation such as some businessman donate their property to the government during a corona pending that is the reason the country was overcome rapidly at that time.

In conclusion , the pursuit must take liability for their country , however , they are not able to give every month  my point of view,  whenever society needs help,  then there will come first for the help.
